or has recurred (come back).,CancerGov,Thymoma and Thymic Carcinoma
What are the stages of Thymoma and Thymic Carcinoma ?,"Key Points
                    - Tests done to detect thymoma or thymic carcinoma are also used to stage the disease.     - There are three ways that cancer spreads in the body.    - Cancer may spread from where it began to other parts of the body.    - The following stages are used for thymoma:         - Stage I     - Stage II     - Stage III     - Stage IV        - Thymic
